title: Typo on query parser syntax web page.
description:
On the web page http://lucene.apache.org/java/docs/queryparsersyntax.html#N10126 the text says:

"To search for documents that must contain "jakarta" and may contain "lucene" use the query:"

The example says:

+jakarta apache

The problem:
The example uses apache where the text says lucene.

comments.content:
thanks for spotting this...

Committed revision 550680.
comments.author: Hoss Man
